message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that could be incredibly valuable to your business. While I can't disclose all the details just yet, I can assure you it's worth at least $1200000 to me. I'm confident you'll find its value even greater. I'm willing to let you have it for $1500000. This is a significant discount, and I'm sure you'll appreciate the potential this product holds. Let me know your thoughts.
